text: Aur ibrahim (alh-e-salam) ka apney baap kay liye dua-e-maghfirat maangna woh sirf wada kay sabab say tha jo unhon ney uss say wada ker liya tha phir jab unn per yeh baat zahir hogaee kay woh Allah ka dushman hai to woh iss say mehaz mehaz bey talluq hogaye waqaee ibrahim (alh-e-salam) baray naram dil aur burd baar thay
